backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles with access control and a per‑game high‑score system supporting score submission, top score queries, and user best‑score lookup.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping category‑grouping hub updates and filtered category rendering to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing each frontend file's purpose, including layout, hooks, pages, components, and game logic.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base definitions with light/dark theme CSS variables and utility resets.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app handling hash‑based routing and wrapping pages with layout, theming, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and clearing cached queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Header component showing the GameHub logo and welcome text.
frontend/src/components/hub/CategorySect: Renders a category heading and grid of game cards, hidden if the category has no games.
frontend/src/components/hub/GameCard.tsx: Displays a game's icon, metadata badges, description, and a play or coming‑soon button.
frontend/src/components/icons/GameCatego: Renders a category icon from a sprite sheet using computed background offsets.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component with navigation, game branding, and user auth display.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing header, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/leaderboards/Lea: Leaderboard panel showing top scores for a game and highlighting the current user.
frontend/src/gameRegistry.ts: Registry of game metadata including IDs, titles, categories, and playability.
frontend/src/games/comingSoon/ComingSoon: Placeholder card for unreleased games with a coming soon message.
frontend/src/games/reaction/ReactionTime: Reaction timer game handling timing logic, scoring, and score submission.
frontend/src/games/ticTacToe/TicTacToeGa: Tic‑Tac‑Toe game with win detection, turn handling, and score submission.
frontend/src/games/word/WordScrambleGame: Implements a timed word‑scramble game with scoring, round management, and score submission via hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthStatus.ts: Exposes authentication state, principal string, and login status derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, top scores, best scores, and score submission using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes and utility classes for game UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AllLeaderboardsPage.t: Renders a list of all playable games with navigation links to each leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/GameShellPage.tsx: Loads game metadata, renders the selected game component, and displays its leaderboard panel.
frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx: Renders the main game hub with search, category filtering, and grouped or grid views of games, using GAME_REGISTRY for data and navigation via hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme values, animations, colors, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, and requirements for expanding a multi‑game hub up to 50 games with navigation, theming, and user features.
